const uint64_t IMAGES[] = {
  0x00000c0c3f0c0c00, // +
  0x000000003f000000, // -
  0x0000663cff3c6600, // *
  0x000103060c183060, // /
  0x0063660c18336300, // %
  0x00003f00003f0000, // =
  0x00000000000030B6e, // ~
  0x0000000063361c08, // ^
  0x00180c0603060c18, //<
  0x00060c1830180c06, //>
  0x00180c0606060c18, //(
  0x00060c1818180c06, //(
  0x001e06060606061e, //[
  0x001e18181818181e, //]
  0x00380c0c070c0c38, //{
  0x00070c0c380c0c07, //}
  0x000c0c0000000000, //.
  0x000c0c00000c0c00, //:
  0x060c0c00000c0c00, //;
  0x060c0c0000000000, //,
  0x00180018183c3c18, //!
  0x000c000c1830331e, //?
  0x001e0370B70B70B633e, //@
  0x006e3330B6e1c361c, //&
  0x000c1f301e033e0c, //$
  0x0036367f367f3636, //#
  0x00406030180c0603, //\
  0x0000000000180c0c, //'
  0x0000000000030606  //'
};
const int IMAGES_LEN = sizeof(IMAGES)/8;
